about.summary: Development headers and libraries for Clang

name: libclang
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: libclang
    version: 11.0.0
source:
    -   folder: .
        patches:
            - patches/0001-Find-conda-gcc-installation.patch
            - patches/0001-Set-VERSION-in-osx-as-well.patch
            - patches/0002-Fix-sysroot-detection-for-linux.patch
            - patches/0002-clang-add-conda-specific-env-var-CONDA_BUILD_SYSROOT.patch
            - patches/0003-clang-Fix-normalizeProgramName-s-handling-of-dots-ou.patch
            - patches/cross-compile.diff
        sha256: 0f96acace1e8326b39f220ba19e055ba99b0ab21c2475042dbc6a482649c5209
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-11.0.0/clang-11.0.0.src.tar.xz
    -   folder: tools/extra
        sha256: fed318f75d560d0e0ae728e2fb8abce71e9d0c60dd120c9baac118522ce76c09
        url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/releases/download/llvmorg-11.0.0/clang-tools-extra-11.0.0.src.tar.xz
build:
    number: 0
    string: default_h7f1e069_0

        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge

        - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 7.5.0 h1a28f53_17

        - libgomp 9.3.0 h5dbcf3e_17
        - libllvm11 11.0.0 he513fc3_0
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h8cfc5f6_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_5

        - libgomp 9.3.0 h8ab15db_17
        - libllvm11 11.0.0 h9643fe5_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 h7a64470_17

        - llvm-tools 11.0.0 h9643fe5_0
